jobs.title: Lead Engineer
achievements: Led screening and interview process of new development hires.
Developed in-house SDLC process.
Led code reviews and enforced development best practices.
Led application migration from JavaScript to TypeScript.
Architected and developed internal CRM software with React, Redux and Redux Saga.
Developed REST based microservices written in Node.js and deployed to Azure.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Led development of micro-frontend integrations across various products using both React.js and Angular.
Developed large scale React applications with TypeScript the scaled to over 200,000 customers.
Worked on development of various event based distributed microservices using tools including Go/Golang and Node.js
Assisted in the development of a company wide UI component library.
Scaffolded scalable Next.js and Typescript architecture for greenfield product development.
Participated in code reviews and enforced development best practices.
Worked with Ops and Product teams to ensure timely product delivery and customer satisfaction.

jobs.title: AVP; Software Engineer
achievements: Awarded Gold and Bronze awards for outstanding performance.
Architected front end application scaffold/pipeline and UI component library using React and Typescript.
Developed workflow automation web applications and analytics dashboards for internal Information-Security teams.
Developed analytics dashboards
Worked closely with customers to gather requirements and ensure timely product delivery.
Led development of Mattermost(Enterprise slack alternative) and Jira integrations across multiple applications/processes.
Architected/developed client side applications using React, Redux, Redux Saga and Styled Components.
Developed server side APIs using Express/Koa and MongoDB/MySQL.
Worked in an agile environment leveraging sprints and Gitflow.
Led code reviews and enforced development best practices.
Held product demonstrations in front of customers and stakeholders.
Trained junior/mid level developers on new technologies.
